QuestData.Title: Driven Mad
QuestData.Description:
The Azure Archives was once a place where the blue dragons would gather to discuss magic.
Now I am the only one of my kind here.
This place controls the ley lines beneath the Azure Span, but it and its servants have gone out of control.
I believe if we bring order to this place that I can then reclaim the Azure Oathstone.
The various constructs and elements are brimming with unstable arcane energy that needs to be redirected.
Destroy them and collect what you can.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work. The creations here are already being soothed with just this amount of unstable arcana removed.
